headline: ALEXANDERWERK ROLLER COMPACTOR BENCHTOP
categories.lvl1: Other Equipment > Other Items and Mixed Lots
specstable:
Manufacturer Alexanderwerk
Model BT 120 Pharma
Description Roller Compactor -- Benchtop
Year of Manufacture 2008
Power Requirements 460 V 6.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Other Information

BT 120 Pharma is used in the for compacting preparations or active substances.

With its highly integrated design, the extremely compact size and a throughput of up to 8 kg/hr., it is the best machine available to advance into galenics. This machine comes with integrated electrical compacting pressure generation and control. Frequency inverters guarantee precision roller drive

Technical Data
Roller Diameter: 120mm
Roller Width: 25mm
Throughput, continuous operation: up to 8 kg per hour (Lactose)
Max Presuure: 20kN/cm
Max. Roller Speed: 15rpm
Max. Roller Gap: 4mm


Exterior Dimensions
Width 38.465 in (97.7 cm)
Depth 35.315 in (89.7 cm)
Height 24.449 in (62.1 cm)
Weight 1,000 lb (454 kg)
